column2: "Well, you know... I know I was the one that said something might happen..."
"But I never meant anything like this! Sheesh!"
"We're in the middle of it! Just a bit more until everyone's out!"
"What exactly's going on, anyway? It's like there's a Devil Castle around. And it's not just happening here?"
"Right. In fact, we're seeing this happen all across Epic."
"...That's not all. There's no Devil Castle in there. It's... Dark Falz."
"Its readings are similar to [Apprentice], even stronger than those at the mining base."
"[Apprentice] should be gone already, so why is it showing up here in this world...?"
"Get it together, fairy! Stop worrying about the \"why\"! It's all about the \"what next\"!"
"...Yeah, you're right! You say some smart things sometimes, Marge!"
"Wha-what's that supposed to mean! I say nothing but smart things!"
"More importantly, will you be okay? Can you handle that giant jerk?"
"I'm the perfect one for the job"
"...I see. Alright, if you say so, then that's that."
"...I'll leave everything to you, then! Feel free to go as wild as you want, just make sure you take that thing out!"
